data.title: Shame film location: Standard High Line
data.meta_description: Standard High Line NYC, Washington Street, Meatpacking District, New York. Sex addict Brandon Sullivan (Michael Fassbender) has an unsuccessful afternoon with Marianne in the 18-story Standard High Line NYC, but he’s more comfortable with the anonymity of a total stranger. Floor-to-ceiling windows allowed filming of the famously explicit scene to be watched by half the population of Manhattan. www.movie-locations.com/movies/s/Shame.html
data.text:
Standard High Line NYC, Washington Street, Meatpacking District, New York.

Sex addict Brandon Sullivan (Michael Fassbender) has an unsuccessful afternoon with Marianne in the 18-story Standard High Line NYC, but he’s more comfortable with the anonymity of a total stranger. Floor-to-ceiling windows allowed filming of the famously explicit scene to be watched by half the population of Manhattan.

www.movie-locations.com/movies/s/Shame.html
